Articles.Content:
hi,

i have a problem.every time i go to the mun or somewhere farther, the game wont budge.the only things working are the manuever nodes ,camera rotation and the menu.everything esle(steering,throttle up/down, sas, rcs...) just wont budge.Last time i went to EVE and it worked just fine.I need help!

P.S. when i launch and get into orbit, its perfectly fine.
Are you sure you're not just running out of electricity? Do you have batteries/solar panels/RTGs?
Might want to see the sticky above this sub-forum,way at the top before posting..
